data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Mangochi, Malawi.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mangochi, Malawi
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, move the 9,100 believers in the state of Mangochi to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Mangochi, Malawi to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Mangochi, Malawi be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kachchi people. Make the Kachchi people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mangochi, Malawi to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 9,100 believers living in the state of Mangochi. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Mangochi to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
